mapper.select: SELECT id, account, name, type, phone, TRIM(password) as password, create_user, create_time, update_time, is_stop FROM sys_user WHERE account = #{account} AND is_stop = 0
SELECT id, account, name, type, phone, TRIM(password) as password, create_user, create_time, update_time, is_stop FROM sys_user ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (id, account, name, type, phone, password, create_user, is_stop) VALUES (#{id}, #{account}, #{name}, #{type}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{createUser}, #{isStop})
